member.name: DEVICE_COPY_OFFLOAD_DESCRIPTOR
member.summary: TheDEVICE_COPY_OFFLOAD_DESCRIPTORstructure is one of the query result structures returned from anIOCTL_STORAGE_QUERY_PROPERTY request. This structure contains the copy offload capabilities for a storage device.

member.name: DEVICE_COPY_OFFLOAD_DESCRIPTOR.Version
member.summary: Contains the size of this structure, in bytes. The value of this member will change as members are added to the structure.

member.name: DEVICE_COPY_OFFLOAD_DESCRIPTOR.Size
member.summary: Specifies the total size of the data returned, in bytes. This may include data that follows this structure.

member.name: DEVICE_COPY_OFFLOAD_DESCRIPTOR.MaximumTokenLifetime
member.summary: The maximum lifetime of the token, in seconds.

member.name: DEVICE_COPY_OFFLOAD_DESCRIPTOR.DefaultTokenLifetime
member.summary: The default lifetime of the token, in seconds.

member.name: DEVICE_COPY_OFFLOAD_DESCRIPTOR.MaximumTransferSize
member.summary: The maximum transfer size, in bytes.

member.name: DEVICE_COPY_OFFLOAD_DESCRIPTOR.OptimalTransferCount
member.summary: The optimal transfer size, in bytes.

member.name: DEVICE_COPY_OFFLOAD_DESCRIPTOR.MaximumDataDescriptors
member.summary: The maximum number of data descriptors.

member.name: DEVICE_COPY_OFFLOAD_DESCRIPTOR.MaximumTransferLengthPerDescriptor
member.summary: The maximum transfer length, in blocks, per descriptor.

member.name: DEVICE_COPY_OFFLOAD_DESCRIPTOR.OptimalTransferLengthPerDescriptor
member.summary: The optimal transfer length per descriptor.

member.name: DEVICE_COPY_OFFLOAD_DESCRIPTOR.OptimalTransferLengthGranularity
member.summary: The granularity of the optimal transfer length, in blocks. Transfer lengths that are not an even multiple of this length may be delayed.
